parameter.name: apiUrl
parameter.description: The url to access the docuSign API.

parameter.name: apiVersion
parameter.description: The version of the docusign API.

parameter.name: accessToken
parameter.description: OAuth Token to send and manipulate data of docusign API.

parameter.name: userName
parameter.description: The username of the docuSign account.

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: The password of the docuSign account.

parameter.name: blocking
parameter.description: The blocking parameter is helping connector performs the blocking invocations to docuSign.
